articles.author: Gerard Meagher
articles.title: Leinster ‘best team in Europe’, says Toulouse coach before semi-final - The Guardian
articles.description: Ugo Mola, Toulouse’s coach, said: ‘We play a team that totally masters European games,’ while Racing 92 face La Rochelle in the other Champions Cup semi-final
articles.content:
Champions Cup

  • Racing 92 face La Rochelle in other Champions Cup semi-final
